definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
velvetleaf (Abutilon avicennae), plant of the jute family/bright
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to seek investment or funding/investment promotion
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world

sentences.english: The first part: to discuss the main concepts and characteristics of commercial subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章，主要介绍商主体的概念和特征。

sentences.english: But the Dallas-based carrier isn't just looking at Boeing.
sentences.chinese: 但这家总部位于达拉斯的承运商不仅仅只是眷顾波音。

sentences.english: The Distributor is authorized to sub-contract and assign the distribution and sales of the Products to sub-contractors of Fangyuan Group.
sentences.chinese: 发行人已授权转包及销售此产品给方园集团的转包商。

sentences.english: Do you know a good optician ?
Ask your student-loan servicer to extend your payback period.
sentences.chinese: 请求你的学生贷款商延长你的还款期限。

sentences.english: None of the auto makers disclosed a pricing strategy in Guangzhou Monday.
sentences.chinese: 周一在广州，没有任何汽车商透露定价策略。

sentences.english: Guidelines for futures commission merchants engaging in market making business shall be separately promulgated by this Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 期货商从事造市业务之作业办法，由本公司另订之。

sentences.english: where the men who used to trade with the tea or the big clock merchants.
sentences.chinese: 那里男人曾经做茶叶的贸易或者大的钟表商。

sentences.english: Farmers and poultry producers have lost billions of dollars as a result.
sentences.chinese: 农牧民和家禽饲养商因此蒙受了数十亿美元的损失。

sentences.english: As distinct from Rights Holder(RHB), Press do not pay a rights fee to cover the Olympic Games.
sentences.chinese: 与转播商不同的是，文字媒体无需支付版权费。

sentences.english: Exhibitors were eager to speak with participants and hear what they had to say.
sentences.chinese: 展出商渴望着与参会者交谈，并倾听他们想要说什么。

sentences.english: The volume of rose imports has already crushed some domestic growers.
sentences.chinese: 大量的进口玫瑰已经挤垮了国内一些种植商。

sentences.english: I know a watchmaker who will buy your watch.
sentences.chinese: 我认识一个钟表商，他会买您的表。

sentences.english: You hear constant calls from street corner vendors ("Handbag?
sentences.chinese: 你能听到街边的小贩商叫卖“要手提包吗？

sentences.english: For the record labels CWM is likely to be a good deal.
sentences.chinese: 对于唱片商来说，CWM看起来是一个不错的交易。

sentences.english: The Car km operated of bus operators refers to pay km.
sentences.chinese: 巴士营办商的車辆行驶里數为收费里數。
